narrative.narrative: Air Kazakhstan was the flag carrier of the same country from 1996-2004 when it went bankrupt and was followed by Air Astana as the countries flag carrier. Almaty was its base. In April 2004 it served 9 domestic destinations,two in Germany,and one each in Azerbaijan,Hungary,India,Russia,South Korea,Tajikistan,Thailand,Turkey,Ukraine, and the UAE. Plane types flown include Tu-154M's,A310-300's,Il-86's,Tu-134's,Yak-42's and 737-200's.
